001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.capture.SegmentRecord;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.segment.SegmentBinIO;
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.nio.file.Path;
007
008/**
009 * Convenience wrapper for reading and writing RADAR segment binary files.
010 *
011 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
012 */
013public final class SegmentIoAdapter {
014  private SegmentIoAdapter() {}
015
016  /**
017   * File writer for {@link SegmentRecord} sequences using {@link SegmentBinIO}.
018   *
019   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
020   */
021  public static final class Writer implements AutoCloseable {
022    private final SegmentBinIO.Writer delegate;
023
024    /**
025     * Creates a writer that rolls files at the specified size.
026     *
027     * @param directory output directory
028     * @param baseName file prefix for rolled files
029     * @param rollMiB roll size in mebibytes
030     * @throws IOException if the writer cannot be opened
031     * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
032     */
033    public Writer(Path directory, String baseName, int rollMiB) throws IOException {
034      this.delegate = new SegmentBinIO.Writer(directory, baseName, rollMiB);
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * Appends a segment record to the current file.
039     *
040     * @param record segment record to write; must not be {@code null}
041     * @throws Exception if writing fails
042     * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
043     */
044    public void append(SegmentRecord record) throws Exception {
045      delegate.append(record);
046    }
047
048    /**
049     * Flushes buffered records to disk.
050     *
051     * @throws Exception if flushing fails
052     * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
053     */
054    public void flush() throws Exception {
055      delegate.flush();
056    }
057
058    /**
059     * Closes the underlying writer.
060     *
061     * @throws Exception if closing fails
062     * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
063     */
064    @Override
065    public void close() throws Exception {
066      delegate.close();
067    }
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * File reader for {@link SegmentRecord} sequences using {@link SegmentBinIO}.
072   *
073   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
074   */
075  public static final class Reader implements AutoCloseable {
076    private final SegmentBinIO.Reader delegate;
077
078    /**
079     * Creates a reader bound to the given directory.
080     *
081     * @param directory directory containing segment files
082     * @throws IOException if the reader cannot be opened
083     * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
084     */
085    public Reader(Path directory) throws IOException {
086      this.delegate = new SegmentBinIO.Reader(directory);
087    }
088
089    /**
090     * Returns the next segment record or {@code null} at EOF.
091     *
092     * @return next segment record, or {@code null} when exhausted
093     * @throws Exception if reading fails
094     * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
095     */
096    public SegmentRecord next() throws Exception {
097      return delegate.next();
098    }
099
100    /**
101     * Closes the underlying reader.
102     *
103     * @throws Exception if closing fails
104     * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
105     */
106    @Override
107    public void close() throws Exception {
108      delegate.close();
109    }
110  }
111}
